Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the applicants fraudulently obtained Convention refugee status by concealing material facts
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicants' testimony found inconsistent and not credible
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Forensic analysis, expert testimony, passport documentation
Crimes.Legal_Provision: s. 69.2(2) and (3) of the Immigration Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Use of Djiboutian passports while claiming Somali citizenship
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in testimony and authenticity of Djiboutian passports
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Somali identity documents presented by applicants
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Fraudulent misrepresentation or concealment of material fact
Crimes.Application_Factor: Nationality misrepresentation to gain refugee status
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Error in credibility assessment and factual findings
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictory documentary evidence and lack of credibility
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Proper notice and opportunity to respond provided
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of genuine Djiboutian passports under false pretenses
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicants' claims inconsistent with forensic evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to res judicata and procedural fairness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Compliance with procedural fairness in reconsideration

Crimes.Crime_Name: Fraudulent gain of Convention refugee status
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the CRDD erred in vacating the applicants' refugee status based on fraudulent concealment of material facts
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review following Minister's application for reconsideration
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Testimony deemed inconsistent and not credible
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Forensic evidence, expert testimony, passport records
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Claimed Somali citizenship but held genuine Djiboutian passports
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Authenticity of Djiboutian passports and implausibility of applicants' explanation
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Fraudulent acquisition of refugee status through misrepresentation
Crimes.Application_Factor: Intent to obtain protection by false identity
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Alleged error in factual findings and credibility assessment
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Reliance on forensic over documentary evidence from applicants
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of authentic foreign documents to misrepresent identity
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Lack of plausibility in applicants' narrative
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that prior determination should bar reconsideration
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Res judicata and new evidence standard

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the applicants fraudulently obtain Convention refugee status by concealing their Djiboutian citizenship?
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicants' testimony inconsistent and not believed
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Expert analysis of passports, government-issued documents
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: False claim of Somali origin despite Djiboutian documentation
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Forensic confirmation of Djiboutian passport authenticity
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Material misrepresentation leading to erroneous refugee grant
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Correctness of factual findings and credibility analysis
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Weight given to official documents over self-reported history
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Opportunity to present evidence was provided
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Presentation of valid foreign documents under false context
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Implausible explanations for possession of Djiboutian passports
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim of procedural unfairness and finality of initial decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Admissibility of new evidence in reconsideration

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Reconsideration of refugee status due to concealed citizenship
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the CRDD err in vacating the applicants' Convention refugee status based on concealment of material facts?
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicants not credible; story inconsistent with evidence
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Forensic passport analysis, expert reports, official records
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Suppression of Djiboutian nationality while claiming Somali origin
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Undisputed authenticity of Djiboutian travel documents
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Concealment of material fact warranting revocation
Crimes.Application_Factor: Citizenship as determinative factor in refugee eligibility
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Existence of error in factual or legal conclusions
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Preference for objective forensic evidence over subjective claims
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of legitimate documents to support false identity
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubt cast on entire narrative due to inconsistencies
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on procedural fairness and finality
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of reconsideration powers under s. 69.2
Crimes.Omission_Type: Active suppression of truth about nationality
